data.name: ReadCase
data.value: select top(1) CLOSURE_REASON, NUMB, STATUS, STATUS_DATE from CKT_CASE where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCaseAssignment
data.value: select top(1) REASON_CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, SPD_ID, OFF_ID, OSP_CODE, OSP_DATE, CAS_NO from CKT_ASSIGN_CASE where (@casNo = CAS_NO) and (REASON_CODE = 'RSP') order by DISCONTINUE_DATE desc

data.name: ReadCaseUnit
data.value: select top(1) CU_NUMBER, CAS_NO, CSP_NO_AP from CKT_CASE_UNIT where (@casNo = CAS_NO) and (CSP_NO_AP = @cspNoAp) order by CU_NUMBER

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadInfrastructure
data.value: select top(1) SYSTEM_GENERATED_I from CKT_INFRASTRUCTURE where SYSTEM_GENERATED_I = @systemGeneratedI

data.name: ReadOfficeServiceProviderOfficeServiceProvider
data.value: select top(1) T1.SPD_GENERATED_ID, T1.OFF_GENERATED_ID, T1.ROLE_CODE, T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE, T2.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T2.DISCONTINUE_DATE, T2.OFF_OFFICE, T3.USER_ID from CKT_OFFICE T2 join CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER T3 join CKT_OFFC_SRVC_PRVR T1 on (T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE = @effectiveDate) and (T1.ROLE_CODE = @roleCode) and (T1.OFF_GENERATED_ID = @offGeneratedId) and (T1.SPD_GENERATED_ID = @spdGeneratedId) and (T3.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = T1.SPD_GENERATED_ID) on T2.OFFICE_ID = T1.OFF_GENERATED_ID

data.name: ReadServiceProviderOfficeServiceProvider1
data.value: select top(1) T1.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, T1.USER_ID, T2.OFF_GENERATED_ID, T2.ROLE_CODE, T2.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T2.DISCONTINUE_DATE from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER T1 join CKT_OFFC_SRVC_PRVR T2 on (T1.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = T2.SPD_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.ROLE_CODE = 'CO') and (T2.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (T2.DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @effectiveDate) and (@offGeneratedId = T2.OFF_GENERATED_ID)

data.name: ReadServiceProviderOfficeServiceProvider2
data.value: select top(1) T1.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, T1.USER_ID, T2.OFF_GENERATED_ID, T2.ROLE_CODE, T2.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T2.DISCONTINUE_DATE from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER T1 join CKT_OFFC_SRVC_PRVR T2 on (T1.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = T2.SPD_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.ROLE_CODE = 'OA') and (T2.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (T2.DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @effectiveDate) and (@offGeneratedId = T2.OFF_GENERATED_ID)

data.name: ReadServiceProviderOfficeServiceProvider3
data.value: select top(1) T1.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, T1.USER_ID, T2.OFF_GENERATED_ID, T2.ROLE_CODE, T2.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T2.DISCONTINUE_DATE from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER T1 join CKT_OFFC_SRVC_PRVR T2 on (T1.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = T2.SPD_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (T2.DISCONTINUE_DATE > @effectiveDate) join CKT_OFC_SRCPRV_RLT T3 on (T2.ROLE_CODE = T3.OSP_R_ROLE_CODE) and (T2.EFFECTIVE_DATE = T3.OSP_R_EFFECTIVE_DT) and (T2.OFF_GENERATED_ID = T3.OFF_R_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.SPD_GENERATED_ID = T3.SPD_R_GENERATED_ID) and (@ospRoleCode = T3.OSP_ROLE_CODE) and (@ospEffectiveDate = T3.OSP_EFFECTIVE_DATE) and (@offGeneratedId = T3.OFF_GENERATED_ID) and (@spdGeneratedId = T3.SPD_GENERATED_ID)
